planText: go to the restaurent or restaurant tonight
Swimming lessons on Wednesday, don't forget your swim wear
Remember to go to the store today to buy milk
Go to the shopping mall and buy some phones
You have a trail to run this next month. you have to train and practice running to win it.
When you go to the shop buy some clothes, and, pay for the bills. also, remember to withdraw some money to use for groceries at the grocery market
Do some cardio, sit-ups, pushups, kick boxing, and some group workout this evening,
Drink enough water for your body and stay healthy
get some lotion in the boutique
workouts and burn some fats, at least 400 calories or kilocalories per day
